title: mute little legends
body:
the cacophonous "sound" that the little legend silverwing needs to be muteable
after carousal people sit there and spam it and it drives me nuts

replies.body: 10000000000%.  The game should never have been launched with a mandatory sound like that.  You should be able to mute yourself, too.  Hauntlings screetch in your ear EVERY WIN without the ability to put a stop to it???  I literally play as the ghost instead of my hauntling because of the unmutable forced screetching....
As a silverwing enthusiast. This is exactly why we do it. One: it's super cute. Second: the tears of the tryhards fuel our cute winged bodies.
Why would you want to purposefully annoy your teammates? You are the kind of player that makes lol such a bad community.

> [{quoted}](name=Posęidon,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=26YpL1Qe,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-10-27T20:19:48.291+0000)
>
> Why would you want to purposefully annoy your teammates? You are the kind of player that makes lol such a bad community.

There are no teammates in tft. It's a real mans sport.

I just do "/mute all" at the beginning of every match these days. The game requires zero communication and a lot of the sounds are very annoying to me, especially when they can seemingly be spammed indefinitely.
im going to have to agree.
You can 100% mute it... but you have to mute other things along with it.
